table_caption: Pearson bivariate correlations between the age of the participant and the top significant variables of the RF model. Correlation coefficient (r) and p-values (before Bonferroni correction) are provided for alcohol use disorder (AUD), control (CTL) group, and the total sample (ALL). None of the variables survived Bonferroni correction for multiple comparisons. Zero-order correlations were used for each group separately (N = 30) and partial correlations controlling for group effects were used for the all sample (N = 60).
